title: Smart Meters, AI, and Calculators: How Technology Is Reshaping Energy Savings in the UK
description: The UK energy market has undergone seismic change in the last five years. title: Whitney Houston is going on tour 13 years after her death, thanks to AI
description: A new concert experience uses artificial intelligence to isolate the late singer’s vocals, bringing her voice back to the stage with a live symphony orchestra.
content:
When Whitney Houston died in 2012, she was just 48 years old. Now, 13 years later, one of the most iconic voices in music is making a return. And, as you might expect, artificial intelligence is involved.
A concert experience, called The Voice of Whi... [3572 chars]

title: Opposition Parties To File Police Complaint Against Assam BJP Over AI Video
description: Opposition parties in Assam have said they will lodge a police complaint against the BJP over a controversial artificial intelligence-generated video circulated on social media.
content:

description: Redis on Wednesday announced an expansion of its artificial intelligence (AI) strategy with the acquisition of real-time data platform Decodable and the launch of LangCache, a fully managed semantic caching service.
content:

title: AI-designed viruses are here and already killing bacteria
description: Artificial intelligence can draw cat pictures and write emails. Now, the same technology can compose a working genome. A research team in California says it used AI to propose new genetic codes for viruses—and managed to get several of these to replicate and kill bacteria.
